GameConsole.Model.Domain

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsole.Model.Domain.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create methods to add/remove countries to Continents, get/set Continents bonus and so on the toString method lists the countries on the continent.
